profile: ROOTER-MAN Plumbing And Drain Service and Basement Syatems is a group of professionals with over 40 years of experience in the industry. Our mission is to provide high quality professional advice and solutions to home-owners. We pride ourselves in providing to our customers the highest standards in customer care throughout the process. We will provide exceptional "beyond the call of duty" services to all our customers. We are committed to providing the highest level of professionalism, service, response and quality workmanship. We take pride in our ability to diagnose, give options and complete the job with 100 percent customer satisfaction every time. If you require emergency plumbing services in the Toronto and GTA regions, there are 24 hour emergency plumbers in Mississauga, Vaughan, Oakville, Etobicoke and Burlington locations on stand-by ready to service you. From Plumbing, Basement Lowering and Underpinning to new basement Floor Upgrades and Drain issues to Wet Basement Waterproofing, Rooter-Man can handle and specializes in these services and more!

profile:
Plumbing and Drain cleaning, camera inspection snaking, full digs, rough-ins for kitchen or bathroom. Septic bed repair, and much more. Has flood company on hand and tiler with 30 years experience. Fully insured. Readers Choice winners for over 5 years. Best plumber, Best kitchen renovation, Best Home renovation. Work with several property management companies. 905 537 9514 call Phil

Phil Richardson has been working in the drain cleaning and plumbing industry for more than 20 years, servicing homes in Hamilton, Brantford, Grimsby and everywhere in between. Phil owns Flash Drains, which has been offering to plumb and drain cleaning for residential and commercial properties. He is very well-liked by the property management companies as he is reliable and has competitive pricing.

The company is also a 6 year Hamilton Community News Readers Choice winner in the Diamond category, also has won several Hamilton Spectator awards for Readers Choice as well in the top categories.

It has been exciting and very rewarding to have been able to serve the public for so many years. It feels great knowing that the service I provide makes people happy, ”Phil said. Being a Hamilton Community News Readers Choice Diamond category award winner is an honor because it is voted on by the people whom I serve. It means a lot to me that people took the time to vote.”

Phil specializes in City of Hamilton quality work you can he is proud of. Phil also provides plumbing and drain cleaning serves for sinks, toilets, sewers and has a partner that does grease traps for restaurants.

Bathroom and kitchen rough-in, septic, well, camera and video inspection, floods- full digs and mainline.

Flash Drains is fully insured and all the work is backed by a full warranty.

Phil believes in fair, honest and quality service at reasonable rates, offering 24- hour emergency service and a 10 percent discount for all seniors. Clients who make a referral get in return 10 percent off their next service.

So, join Phil and Flash Drains’ ever-growing referral club today. For more information contact Phil on his cell phone 905 537 9514, flashdrains@hotmail.com or visit them at www.flashdrains.ca.
